page.title: 12Favourite Books
page.content: There are books for children and adults.{Young children's}books have simple,{easy to read}stories. The next age group get harder.{Adults}books are usally about{gardening}and{love stories. At school you read books with different reading levels. My friends like the books that{I read}which are {Fighting Fantasy}books where you choose where to go on to in the story. For example, as you reach the temple you see a path leading to the west. Do you want to go along the west path?(turn to page 327). Or do you want to go inside the temple?(turn to page 64). And you get to{fight {creatures}by using dice. You have a certain goal to make, like you must find the{Warlock}and destroy him.
